contents: "While 80 percent of the population would prefer to live in a single-family home, seven in ten Americans (70 percent) actually do. Apartment and condo living is only preferred by 8 percent of the population, yet two in 10 Americans (17 percent) live in an apartment or condo." 美国百分之70的人口住独栋别墅，也就是说不像中国那样的封闭式小区的。你说的纽约那种楼房在美国极少。
